post:
Hello,
We've been around for 5+ years and own & colocate our hardware and networking gear and have our own ARIN issued IPs for our US based locations. We've recently added new SSD hardware to our Frankfurt, Germany and Amsterdam, The Netherlands location and would like to share an offer with you.

Our Site: https://crowncloud.net/

**Datacenter**
AcceleratedIT, Frankfurt, Germany
Test IPv4: 84.200.17.1
Test IPv6: 2a0a:51c0:0:1f::1

Equinix AM11, Amsterdam, The Netherlands
Test IPv4: 185.208.208.3
Test IPv6: 2a0b:3c40:1:103::1

Quadranet & Psychz, Los Angeles, California
Test IP Quadranet: 198.55.111.5 / 2607:fcd0:0:a::1
Test IP Psychz: 104.149.18.203 / 

**SSD Plan 1**
4 GB RAM
60 GB SSD
4 core fair-share access include
1 Snapshot (User can restore/create/destroy snapshot from the panel)
KVM based
2 TB bandwidth per month
1 Gbit/sec upink
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6

$7/month or $35/semi-annual

Order Links
* Frankfurt, Germany - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=383
* Amsterdam, The Netherlands - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=412

**SSD Plan 2**
2 GB RAM
30 GB SSD
4 core fair-share access include
1 Snapshot (User can restore/create/destroy snapshot from the panel)
KVM based
2 TB bandwidth per month
1 Gbit/sec upink
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6

$5/month or $25/semi-annual

Order Links
* Frankfurt, Germany - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=347
* Amsterdam, The Netherlands - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=398

**Storage Plan 1**
512 MB RAM
1000 GB HDD
2 core fair-share access include
6 TB bandwidth per month
1 Gbit/sec upink
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6

KVM powered

Price
$7/month or $35/semi-annually

Order Links
* Frankfurt, Germany - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=360
* Los Angeles, USA - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=309

**Storage Plan 3**
512 MB RAM
500 GB HDD
2 core fair-share access include
3 TB bandwidth per month
1 Gbit/sec upink
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6

KVM powered

Price
$5/month or $25/semi-annually

Order Links
* Frankfurt, Germany - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=359
* Los Angeles, USA - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=306

**Storage Plan 4**
512 MB RAM
250 GB HDD
2 core fair-share access include
3 TB bandwidth per month
1 Gbit/sec upink
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6

KVM powered

Price
$25/year

Order Links
* Frankfurt, Germany - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=363
* Los Angeles, USA - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=318


Note: 
1. RAM can be upgraded on Storage VPSes upto 2 GB max (ie, 1.5 GB addon) at $1/month per 512 MB (ie, 2 GB RAM total will cost you $3/month)
2. Storage VPSes can be upgraded at any time, you will retain the promotional pricing, for example, if you start with 500G Storage plan ($5/month) and wish to upgrade to 1000G Storage plan after 3 months, your cost will be $7/month -- same as this promotion.

Operating systems:
1. We've got 1-click install templates for CentOS 6/7/8, Debian 8/9/10, various Ubuntu(s) upto 19.10, Windows 2012/2016.
2. SSH Key insert during install support is included
3. In-control panel rDNS support is included
4. Custom ISOs can be requested to be mounted onto your VPS for free as well via ticket.
5. Also do note, We do not provide licenses for Windows, the customer is responsible for the license on the machine.
